name: Cicada: Midsummer Roar
description:
-----

This short game was produced during two days for A Game By Its Cover 2015

(#AGBIC): http://itch.io/jam/a-game-by-its-cover-2015

Cicada: Midsummer Roar is inspired by the following cover from the

Famicase 2015 exhibit: http://famicase.com/15/softs/109.html

Controls (In-Game)

------------------

Move: Directions

Attack: Z / X / Space / Enter

Controls (Menu)

---------------

Confirm: Z / X / Space / Enter
